mapper.sql: id as id , creator as creator , createDate as createDate , lastModifier as lastModifier , lastModDate as lastModDate , status as status , dataModelId as dataModelId , dataId as dataId , userId as userId

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
